author: Jerry A. Bair
comment: I recently bought an upgraded phone. On my old phone I had this app, I loved it, I upgraded to premium to delete commercials and to give me unlimited access. When I bought my new phone, I was told that all apps would reload to my phone as they we currently installed. Now I'm being told again that I need to upgrade my app to premium to enjoy unlimited access to recipes. I had hundreds of recipes saved, which i cannot currently access. I am very disappointed in this and wish to ask consideration of you to rectify this inconvenience. Thank you

reply.author: Recipes by Riafy
reply.content: Hey Jerry, thank you for being a loyal user. We are extremely sorry for the inconvenience caused. Have you used your existing email while signing in the new device ? Please contact us at riafytechnologies@gmail.com and we'll help you out to restore your purchases as soon as possible.

comment: I am a recipeholic, lol & absolutely love Cookbook Recipes App! It has a great format, ease of navigation and has periodic information that is extremely helpful! And the recipes are awesome! If you're searching for an awesome recipe app, you've FOUND IT!

reply.author: Recipes by Riafy
reply.content: This is awesome dear. Team Cookbook is so happy to know that you like the experience with Cookbook. Would love to see creating your own personal collection of recipes for all occasions. A great year ahead.

comment: I find lots of recipes to make and it help you to now how to cut onions and ect and it's a really good app.

reply.author: Recipes by Riafy
reply.content: We are super happy to know that you like the Cookbook experience. Looking forward to some exciting recipes made by you.
